title: ranganai tudippOrkku
sahitya:
ranganaith-tudippOrk-kiDarEdu antaranga
 bhaktiyuDan iravum paghalum maravAdhu pANDu


anupallavi

  angaLamE taruvAn sakala jaganmaNDalamum uyar
  viNDalarum paNi muNDaka pAdanai paNDari nAthanai


caraNam    tandaiyaippOl poruL ellAm taruvAn tAyenap-parindeDut-
 taNaikkavum varuvAn cintai kalangi kadarum gajarAjan
 sheppiya mei praNavap-poruLAi oLir cakrAyudanAI vandANDa pANdu
